page.title: 07Book Binding in Wootton
page.content: Two people called Sarah and Chris work in Wootton,they do Book Binding.They got into doing Book Binding by watching some-one else doing it.Both of them enjoy doing it a lot.They were trained at Guilford in Surrey.They work from Monday to Friday and usually on Saturday morning.They have been doing it for 3 years,but they trained for 2 years.Mostly old people come to get their family Bibles bound.The hardest book they had ever done was one which was not yet completed,it was a Bible. Sarah and Chris said it was satisfying and relaxing work.
